categoryDescription.title: Isoart EPS Beads offer light and protective filling for packaging.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart EPS Beads are low-density expanded polystyrene granules, ideal for filling spaces in packaging and protecting fragile products during transport and storage. With high impact resistance and lightness, they are perfect for logistics, retail and e-commerce industries, being 100% recyclable and sustainable.

benefits.title: Impact protection
benefits.description: Absorbs shocks, protecting fragile products in packaging.

benefits.title: Sustainability
benefits.description: 100% recyclable, with reverse logistics by Isoart.

generalCharacteristics: Does not propagate fungi or bacteria

applications.title: Protective filling for fragile product packaging
applications.description: Isoart EPS Beads are ideal for filling spaces in packaging, protecting fragile products such as electronics, glass and retail items during transport and storage. With lightness and resistance, they serve logistics, e-commerce and retail industries, reducing damage and costs.

tabDescriptions.Impact protection: EPS granules absorb shocks, ensuring protection of fragile products during transport.
tabDescriptions.Lightness: With density of 10-12 kg/m³, beads reduce packaging weight, optimizing logistics costs.
tabDescriptions.Versatility: 2-8 mm granules adapt to different types of packaging and products.
tabDescriptions.Sustainability: 100% recyclable and CFC-free, Isoart moldings are environmentally responsible.
